ch.linetic.gesture

Interface PoseInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Pose

    public interface PoseInterface
    A pose is composed of several Joint (one of each JointType). This interface describes what a pose can offer.
    Author:
    ketsio

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PoseInterface.JointType
      The enum JointType enumerates all the types of joint present in the body that the Kinect is able to recognize.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Joint getCenterOfMass()
      Get the center of mass of the pose
      Joint getJoint(PoseInterface.JointType jointType)
      Get a Joint in a particular JointType

      Set a Joint in a particular JointType

    • Method Detail

      • getJoint

        Joint getJoint(PoseInterface.JointType jointType)
        Get a Joint in a particular JointType
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a Joint

      • setJoint

        void setJoint(PoseInterface.JointType jointType,
            Joint joint)
        Set a Joint in a particular JointType
        Parameters:
        jointType - the type of joint (part of the body)

      • getCenterOfMass

        Joint getCenterOfMass()
        Get the center of mass of the pose
